name: TigerFacts
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tiger facts
des: Tigers, one of the world's charismatic megafauna, have seen their numbers dwindle in the last five decades. They are categorized as an "Endangered Species" by the International Union for Conservation of Nature due to habitat loss, poaching and habitat fragmentation. Despite conservation efforts, the awareness among the public regarding their situation is pretty low. This facts aims to educate people about the unique characteristics of these majestic animals so as to increase awareness regarding their plight.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
